column4: Hey ya'll, I'm following a how to found at  http://www.krizka.net/2008/03/28/how-to-setup-fprint-for-fingerprint-authentication-on-ubuntu/  and it had me add a new repository to my sources list... But when I try to install the software the how to asks me to it says it's not found.
Is there any way to browse the repository to see if the software is realy.
did you run aptitude update before you want to install the package?
aptitude search <package> is what I would do
